name: 林筱玫
objective:
在這個 e 化的時代，傳送訊息的表現手法如文字、影像、聲音、影片等都被廣泛的運用，組織這些文字、影像、聲音、影片等資料的就成了一個必須重視的課題。媒體產業和文創產業除了深受媒體定律影響，還包括無所不在的網路對於經濟、文化、和社會衝擊，衍生的直接和間接效應。本課程中講解文創的法則並依序從媒體理論、經濟理論、管理理論與文化理論加以說明，並同學需選定某一產業如：電影、音樂、出版、遊戲、博奕、職業運動、表演藝術、主題樂園、時尚奢華等，提出期末報告。
The industry and the media have a far-reaching influence, and the laws and regulations of the Internet have direct and indirect impacts on the economy, society, culture, and social power. In the electronic age, text, image, sound and video are all widely used; the organization of these data has become an important issue. In this course, the principles of cultural creativity are illustrated and explained from media, economic, management, and cultural theories. Further, students must choose a specific industry, such as film, music, publishing, games, gaming, professional sports, performing arts, theme parks, fashion, luxury, etc., and put forward the end-of-term report.
